alert.note: Alert for Des Moines; Henry; Lee; Van Buren (Iowa) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS QuadCities (Eastern Iowa and Northwestern Illinois - Quad Cities)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 17 at 12:13PM CDT by NWS QuadCities
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Henderson, southern Henry, southwestern Des Moines, east central Van Buren and northern Lee Counties through 100 PM CDT... At 1212 PM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Salem, or 12 miles southwest of Mount Pleasant, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. This strong thunderstorm will be near... St. Paul around 1220 PM CDT. West Point, Franklin and Lowell around 1225 PM CDT. Danville and Denmark around 1230 PM CDT. Other locations in the path of this storm include Fort Madison, Middletown and Iowa Army Ammunition Plant. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Des Moines; Henry; Lee; Van Buren
